name: City Surf Project
description: City Surf Project improves the health and well-being of Bay Area youth by connecting them to the ocean and themselves through surfing. Using surfing as a vehicle we engage young people with our three pillars: respect for nature, healthy lifestyle, and personal growth.
fullDescription: City Surf Project improves the health and well-being of Bay Area youth by connecting them to the ocean and themselves through surfing. Using surfing as a vehicle we engage young people with our three pillars: respect for nature, healthy lifestyle, and personal growth.
whatTheyOffer: City Surf Project uses surfing as a vehicle to improve the health and well-being of Bay Area youth and to engage them with their four pillars: Healthy Living, Personal Growth, Appreciation for Nature and Equity in Surfing. They focus on providing youth with their first exposure to the ocean. We serve five districts in San Francisco â€“ Bayview, Mission, Excelsior, Sunset, and Fillmore.
